title: Relic shield
body: Some times relic shield works on thresh.

replies.body:
The 'execute function' and 'kill gold to self and nearby ally' effect with the heal are separate functions so if you last hit a minion with it as a ranged Champion you still get the gold grant and heal but it's a little more difficult than doing so as a melee since you can execute the minion from much higher health.

Some people take a flat AD page with thresh though to make it easier...
Relic shield always works on thresh I only don't use it on thresh cause I can't last hit that well.
thresh can last hit well with his flay passive.
